reindeer trader
Unique merchant unit. [NEWLINE]Ability to create and maintain an [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route. Automatically build roads and acquire cells as the journey progresses.
Loot immunity
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade routes cannot be pillaged by enemy units. The first time you move within 9 tiles of a city, the unowned tile will fall under your control.
trick or treat
Adjacent enemy units -1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
trick or treat
Adjacent enemy cities have -1 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty per turn.
Charisma
The [ICON_Strength] combat strength of a unit increases or decreases according to the charm of the cell it is in.
+{Amount} from the charm of the cell it is in
+{Property} from nearby dead units
+{Property} from nearby dead barbarians
+3 Combat Strength
+3 Religious Combat Strength
super soldier
After being injured, it will not suffer from combat debuffs, can resist large-scale lethal weapons, and can move after attacking.
hyperspace
The unit's [ICON_Strength] combat strength changes with the times.
+{Amount} from
reverse time and space
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting more advanced units.
+{Amount} from fighting advanced units
strategic maintenance
This unit consumes no strategic resources when it is created and when it is maintained.
robot hunter
+40 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against Giant Killer Robots
+40[ICON_Strength] Combat strength from defending against giant killer robots
halloween carnival

The witch's characteristic item can increase the loyalty pressure that this city spreads to itself and surrounding cities. [NEWLINE]When activated, each [ICON_Citizen] citizen has +3 loyalty pressure for this city each turn. This effect will also affect other cities within a range of 9 cells, but the effect will be weakened by 10% every 1 cell. After the completion of the project, the [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty of the location and the adjacent [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty increase, and the foreign city [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty decreases (decreasing according to the distance).
move the capital
Witch featured item. After completion, the [ICON_Capital] capital will be moved to this city.
golden memory
Gramophone Featured Items. Let the people recall the glorious past time, the era score +10.
dark memories
Gramophone Featured Items. Let the people recall the gloomy past, the era score -10.
move mountains
Turns the cell it is in into a Hills cell. [NEWLINE]Mountains can only be transformed if they are not volcanoes.
reclamation
Convert the cell it is in to a plain cell. [NEWLINE]Only transform lakes and coasts that have no resources.
make land
Convert the existing cell and adjacent cells to plain cells. [NEWLINE]Only transform lakes, coasts and oceans that have no resources.
Building a city on the sea
+{1_num}[ICON_Science] science and technology value comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_Culture] culture value comes from the sea city.

gold

Gold is a metal discovered and utilized by humans earlier. Because gold is rare, special and precious, it has the title of "King of Metals". It enjoys a reputation unmatched by other metals, and its prominent status is almost eternal. Because gold has this "noble" status, gold used to be a symbol of wealth and luxury. With the development of society, the economic status and application level of gold are constantly changing, but it still occupies a place in the international reserves of various countries. It is a special commodity with currency attributes, commodity attributes and financial attributes.
[ICON_RESOURCE_DAL_GOLD] Gold Enterprise: Create new products
